mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(AVG(r.rating), 0) AS average_rating FROM Reviews r LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON r.appointment_id = a.id WHERE a.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(r.rating), 0) AS average_rating FROM Reviews r LEFT JOIN Appointments a ON r.appointment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN Employees e ON a.employee_id = e.id WHERE e.business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reviews (appointment_id, rating, comment, created_at) VALUES (#{appointmentId}, #{rating}, #{comment}, #{createdAt})
